doc.title: My Sex Tour Vol. 3
doc.plot: Yes, we love the women of the world! From European penetrations to a jaunt up to Canada, we could never fuck all the world's pussy. Sweet, young, beautiful,and a hardly a word of English to endure. There's no need for small talk - we speak the international language of Fucking. We break down the international barriers double teaming hot Euro pink, covering their cute foreign faces with import jizz!
